lines.text: They're just little boys that need to have their bottoms wiped.
You let nanny and the cook go.
I did?
Fired them ruthlessly.
Dear God, by whose mercy...
Dear God, by whose mercy...
...I am shielded for a few hours...
...I am shielded for a few hours...
...let no-one snatch me from this heaven.
...let no-one snatch me from this heaven.
My virginity is the only thing I possess.
I'll give you that sound if you let me go.
We can't have you walking about looking like a whore.
Daddy Albert was arrested in Philadelphia for interfering with a minor.
Why is the bed warm at eleven o'clock in the morning? A decent bed isn't supposed to be warm.
Crazy people never look their age.
That's disgusting. You're all disgusting!
Is your goddamn mother at home? I'm not going to eat you, you silly bitch.
Do you realize that, all over the Australian bush, fathers are bashing their daughters like there's no tomorrow?
Shall we order now?
I think I'd like an enormous piece of red meat.
You look more like a cow than my late wife, no offense, I'm very fond of cows.
If you don't let her go, she'll get smaller and smaller.
I had a daughter once, a very unusual child.
What happened to her?
She vanished.
[snaps her fingers]
What are you doing in my mother's clothes? Get out!

[song]
Oh that I were where I would be, / There would I be where I am not; / But where I am there I must be, / And where I would be I can not.
There were two mice fell in a bucket of milk, one yelled for help and drowned, the other kept pedaling around until, in the morning, he found himself on top of butter.
James. Obviously, you're not James. What do you want of my daughter?
You have no right to ask me ANY questions!
"NO" right? You must be out of your mind! I'm her legal guardian.
No, you're not!

Very well, I'm not... not yet. Not *legally.* I've had no time to make the necessary arrangements. I've been away. But I can assure you, I intend to take every step to insure my rights. Warner and Swazey are my attorneys. Who are yours?
You missed a fabulous dinner, mummy!
You bet your sweet ass.
Get off my back, you little bitch!

aspirin, disprin, veganin, codeine, the lot. I lay down on the sofa, the music was playing, I drifted off down a cool river toward the sea... if ya' gotta' go, that's the way to do it. Like in a poem. Except, I became violently sick. I staggered out to the loo. I could hardly make it. I started to go blind. I was puking like a drunken sailor. I slipped and fell and I broke my bloody hip. And that's how he found me. Do you know what Bernard said to me?

[Chuckles ruefully, then mockingly imitates Bernard with a silly voice]
You could have killed yourself, honey.

[singing]
Hush little baby, cry no more. Father's gone fishing, mother's a whore. Back in the morning, to guard your life, with two short prayers, and a carving knife.
